issue.title: Provide optional syntax validation for IRIs when using ValueFactory.createIRI

labels.name: ðŸ“¶ enhancement

repository.name: rdf4j
repository.description: Eclipse RDF4J: scalable RDF for Java

issue.body:
I had a bug where my problem was, that I created an IRI with a leading whitespace so:

ValueFactory.createIri(" http://something.com") 

instead of 

ValueFactory.createIri("http://someting.com")

In my opinion it would be a good idea if the createIri method would trim whitespaces before creating the IRI or maybe throw an error if an IRI is created with whitespaces.

issue.title: Fix #69: IRI Parser for validation and resolution

repository.name: rdf4j

issue.body:
This PR addresses GitHub issue: #69 .

Briefly describe the changes proposed in this PR:

* Creats ParsedIRI for RFC 3987 IRI syntax validation
* Deprecates ParsedURI in favor of ParsedIRI
